name: 2nd Edition of International Heart Congress
content: Join us for the "2nd Edition of International Heart Congress" to be held from June 20-22, 2024, in Paris, France, featuring a hybrid format with both in-person and online sessions. Under the theme "HEART: Hindrances, Evolutions, Advancements and Recent Trends in Cardiology," this conference aims to provide a platform for the development, implementation, and sharing of knowledge in cardiovascular disease, heart health, medicine, and related domains. With cardiovascular diseases responsible for approximately 15 million deaths worldwide each year, accounting for almost 50% of adult mortality, Heart Conferences 2024 aims to address these pressing issues. This groundbreaking event will offer a transformative professional experience, covering a wide range of on-going cardiology research and the use of innovative technologies in the treatment of heart failure and cardiovascular diseases. Renowned academicians, scientists, researchers, healthcare professionals, cardiologists, heart care specialists, students, and industry experts will converge to discuss methods for treating heart diseases, advancements in cardio medicine, pediatric cardiology, heart failure, electrocardiography, and other relevant health topics. The esteemed speakers at this conference will cover both general and specialized areas of interest. We invite you to join us at Cardiovascular Colloquium, where you can explore the latest knowledge and innovations in the field. It is an excellent opportunity to network with experts, share insights, and contribute to advancements in the diagnosis, prognosis, and treatment of cardiovascular diseases.
